Title: Mochalatta Chills
Writer: Naomi Ekperigin (staff writer), Ilana Glazer (created by), Abbi Jacobson (created by), Anthony King (staff writer), Jen Statsky
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, John Gemberling, Paul W. Downs
Plot: New opportunities arise as Abbi is finally able to train somebody at Soulstice and Ilana finds success as a corporate overlord.
